column1: This is it...\| The scriptures all lead to this place...\| where it all began.
column2: Aquí es...\| Todas las escrituras conducen a este lugar,\| donde comenzó todo.

column1: Holy Donar...\| hear me...\| I have made the journey...\! I bring to you the voices of your followers...\| thousands of them...\| hear us and hear our plea...
column2: Sagrado Donar...,\| escúchame...\| He completado el viaje...\! Os traigo la voz de vuestros fieles,\| miles de ellos...\| Escuchadnos y atended nuestras plegarias...

column1: We have nothing left to give...
